description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Boost Your Energy Levels Now Using Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • Why You Need To Boost Your Energy?
  • 1) Do you sometimes need a quick, reliable injection of extra energy? 2) Would you prefer a natural energy booster to get you going when you need it? 2. How Self Hypnosis Can Help? 1) One thing that hypnosis can do is improve the connection between your mind and body. Your mind and your body are always connected to each other â€” the stronger the connection, the better it is for your physical and mental wellness. 2) Syncing both mind and body together can result to an increase in your energy levels. Because the mind is the fuel that powers you as a physical machine, a healthy mind will also mean that you have more energy to do the things that you want. 3) Self hypnosis helps change your old and limiting beliefs and thoughts 4) Self hypnosis brings more mental alertness 5) Self Hypnosis helps you a great wave of relaxation refreshing your whole body 6) Self hypnosis helps to connect with the deep sources of power and energy within you 7) Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude 8) Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

This course is for those who want to increase their energy levels and become more confident in their life and energetic during important situations in their personal and professional life.

It is also very helpful for people who want to get over depression , anxiety , insomnia , negativity and stress.

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonus.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Boost Your Energy

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
title: Hypnosis - Boost Your Energy Levels Now Using Self Hypnosis
